message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,150,000. It's a valuable asset that I believe will be highly beneficial to your business. I'm confident this price represents a fair value for both of us. Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,050,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $1,050,000 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further to $1,100,000, reflecting the significant value this product will bring to your business. This price still allows you to make a substantial profit.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
